word:
Chap. 54 - The Subject Presented in1883
[MORNING
TALK TO THE MINISTERS ASSEMBLED AT THE GENERAL
CONFERENCE, BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN, NOVEMBER, 1883.
PUBLISHED IN GOSPEL WORKERS (1892 ED.), PP.
411-415, UNDER THE TITLE "CHRIST OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS."]

     "If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness" (1 John 1:9).
